scripts.test: npm run test-soy && npm run test-units && npm run test-core
scripts.test-soy: echo Starting soy tests ... && karma start test/soy_tests.conf
scripts.test-units: echo Starting unit tests ... && karma start test/unit_tests.conf
scripts.test-core: echo Starting core tests ... && karma start test/core_tests.conf
scripts.build: npm run build-static-files && npm run build-extra-files && npm run build-framework-files && npm run rebuild
scripts.build-framework-files: npm run build-external-frameworks && npm run build-internal-frameworks
scripts.fast-build: npm run build && npm run launch
scripts.fast-rebuild: npm run rebuild && npm run launch
scripts.launch: echo Lauching app. Please wait ... && npm run launch-linux --silent || npm run launch-mac --silent ||Â npm run launch-win --silent
scripts.clean: echo Cleaning up. Please wait ... && npm prune && rimraf genfiles/* && rimraf test/genfiles/* && rimraf gensoyfiles/*
scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.sync: echo Syncing. Please wait ... && git pull && git submodule init && git submodule update && npm run update
scripts.update: npm run clean && ncu -u -a && npm install && npm update -a && npm test
